lines: ma lus dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi
stong nyid snying rje dbyer med byang chub sems
spyan ras gzigs gyur de la phyag 'tshal nas
de nyid sgrub thabs mdor bsdus bri bar bya
deng nas srog gcod mi bya zhing
gzhan gyi nor yang blang mi bya
'khrig pa'i chos kyang mi spyod cing
rdzun gyi tshig kyang mi smra'o
skyon ni mang po nyer brten pa'i
chang ni yongs su spang bar bya
khri stan che mtho mi bya zhing
de bzhin dus ma yin pa'i zas
dri dang phreng ba rgyan dang ni
gar dang glu sogs spang bar bya
ji ltar dgra bcom rtag tu ni
srog gcod la sogs mi byed ltar
de bzhin srog gcod la sogs spang
bla med byang chub myur thob shog
sdug bsngal mang 'khrugs 'jig rten 'di
srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog
'gro rnams bsgral 'dod bsam pa yis
sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la
byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar
rtag par bdag ni skyabs su mchi
shes rab snying brtse dang bcas pas
brtson pas sems can don du bdag
sangs rgyas mdun du gnas bgyis te
rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed bgyi
dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi sku
'gro drug sems can rnams la spyan ras gzigs
nam mkha' lta bur khyab pa'i bcu gcig zhal
gzi brjid 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo
phyag stong 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stong
'phags pa seng ge'i sgra dang yid bzhin nor
padma gar dbang thugs rje mi bshol dang
don yod zhags dang ha la ha la ste
spyan ras gzigs dbang rnams la phyag 'tshal lo
padma rgyan dang rdo rje chos dbang phyug
ha ri ha ri la zhon mgrin sngon te
phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thugs rje can
ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni
lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar
lha yi chu ni dag pa yis
de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol
ma lus sems can kun gyi mgon gyur cing
bdud sde dpung bcas mi bzad 'joms mdzad lha
dngos rnams ma lus ji bzhin mkhyen gyur pa'i
bcom ldan 'khor bcas gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol
'jig rten bla ma srid pa gsum gyis bstod pa po
lha yi gtso bo bdud dang tshangs pas bstod pa po
thub pa'i rgyal mchog bstod pas grub par mdzad pa po
'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po mchog la phyag 'tshal lo
bde gshegs dpag med sku ste sku bzang 'dzin pa po
bde gshegs snang ba mtha' yas dbu rgyan 'dzin pa po
phyag g.yas mchog sbyin yi dwags bkres skom sel ba po
phyag g.yon gser gyi padmas rnam par brgyan pa po
dri zhim ral pa'i phreng ba dmar ser 'khyug pa po
zhal ras rgyas pa zla ba lta bur mdzes pa po
spyan gyi padma mchog tu bzang zhing yangs pa po
kha ba dung ltar rnam dkar dri ngad ldan pa po
dri med 'od chags mu tig tshom bu 'dzin pa po
mdzes pa'i 'od zer skya rengs dmar pos brgyan pa po
padma'i mtsho ltar phyag ni dngar bar byas pa po
gser gyi ska rags mchog la nor bus spras pa po
sta zur dkris pa'i ras bzang sham thabs 'dzin pa po
thub pa'i mkhyen mchog mtsho chen pha rol phyin pa po
mchog brnyes bsod nams mang po nye bar bsags pa po
rtag tu bde ba'i 'byung gnas rga nad sel ba po
gsum mthar mdzad cing mkha' spyod pa spyod pa ston pa po
lus can mchog ste bdud dpung 'khrug las rgyal ba po
gser gyi rkang gdub sgra yis zhabs yid 'ong ba po
tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi yis dben par mdzad pa po
ngang pa'i 'gros 'dra glang chen dregs ltar gshegs pa po
yongs rdzogs nye bar bsags shing bstan pa gnyer ba po
'o ma'i mtsho dang chu yi mtsho las sgrol ba po
gang zhig rtag tu tho rangs langs nas gus pa yis
spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yid la sems byed cing
bstod pa'i mchog 'dis dag cing gsal bar bstod byed na
de ni skyes pa 'am ni bud med yin yang rung
skye ba 'di 'am ma 'ongs skye ba thams cad du
'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das dgos pa kun 'grub 'gyur
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i gter
'khor dang bcas pa bdag la dgongs su gsol
bdag dang pha ma rigs drug sems can rnams
myur du 'khor ba'i mtsho las bsgral du gsol
zab cing rgya che bla med byang chub sems
myur du rgyud la skye bar mdzad du gsol
thog med nas bsags las dang nyon mongs rnams
thugs rje'i chab kyis myur du dag mdzad nas
thugs rje'i phyag brkyangs bdag dang 'gro ba rnams
bde ba can gyi zhing du drang du gsol
'od dpag med dang spyan ras gzigs dbang gis
tshe rabs kun tu dge ba'i bshes mdzad nas
ma nor lam bzang legs par bstan nas kyang
myur du sangs rgyas sa la bzhag tu gsol
zhes gdung shugs drags pos gsol ba gdab
'gro ba'i sgron me spyan ras gzigs mgon la
dri zhim bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis khrus gsol bas
'gro ba'i sgrib gnyis dri ma kun bsal nas
dri bral sku gsum brnyes pa'i bkra shis shog
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang sgrub pa'i thabs
rgyud sde'i dgongs pa rnams dang mi 'gal zhing
dpal ldan dpal mo'i dgongs pa ji lta bar
bkod pas 'gro kun sangs rgyas nyid thob shog
ces pa 'di ni don gnyer can mang po dang
